page.title: 16A day in my life
page.content: I am called{Teresa Williams.}I am tall with a medium build.I have a mother and father who look after me and a brother called Norman.My day begins at {7.20a.m.}I wake and dress usually for school.At school I go to my form room where I meet the rest of the class.Ms Cormack is my Form teacher.She is one of many teachers at school.Lessons begin at{9.25.}Most work is done in exercise books.After the lesson has finished we have a break.This happens {4}times a day.After school I come home and change clothes.Sometimes I play or help around the house.I then have my tea.After tea I watch some television or do my school homework.I usually go to bed around{8.30.}I undress and wash.I then write my diary or read a book.At{8.50}I place my book under my bed,and try to go to sleep ready for the next day at school.
